SUMMARY
I have worked with county government of Bungoma as a trainee geologist for 2 months, and later with
Everesta as a junior geologist  (hydro-geologist  &geotechnical  expert)  for 2 months. Currently I am
working as a hydro-geologist and geotechnical expert with Earth Water  Limited. I have had technical
experience working on international projects, for instance UNHCR, KRCS among  other organizations.
CAREER OBJECTIVE
Geologist with 1+ years of experience in the water, geotechnical, EIA and mineral analysis. Aiming to use my
proven geological skills and services to effectively fill the geologist role in your organization. A dedicated worker
aiming to help achieve company goals and take on more responsibility as quickly as possible.

PROJECTS
Project Name: Pinying water project-Narok County
Role: Hydro-geologist 
and Geotechnical expertTeam Size: 3 Project Duration: 2 Day
Project DetailThe project entailed the mapping of groundwater so as to advice on the Borehole
drilling to serve the community. The project also entailed dam Investigation,
where a trial pit was dug at the reservoir to ascertain the type of soil and its
characteristics to retain water. Vertical electrical soundings were also executed
at the dam axis or the dam embankment to determine the type and the strength of
rocks to withstand the force of water and its weight.
Project Name: Sogoo water project-Narok
Role: Geotechnical expert
Project DetailTeam Size: 3 Project Duration: 1 Day
The project entailed the mapping of the subsurface so as to advice on the best
intake tank site location in reference to the basement rock type. The project also
entailed treatment tank site investigation, where  a trial pit was dug to ascertain
the type of soil and its characteristics to control waste Seepage. Vertical
electrical soundings were also executed to determine the type and the strength of
rocks. A trial pit was also dug at some other point for a tank site investigation.
Later the soil samples were send to the laboratory for analysis and to determine
their atterberg limits.
Project Name: Olopikidongoe water project-Narok
Role: Hydro-geologist 
and Geotechnical expertTeam Size: 3 Project Duration: 1 Day
Project Detail It comprised of pan investigation, borehole  survey and septic tank site
investigation. A number of VES were executed with trial pits done. All
these were ascertain the subsurface conditions of the rocks and soil.
Project Name: Bungoma county-Borehole supervision
Role: Hydro-geologist
Project DetailTeam Size: 4 Project Duration: 3 Day
The project entailed geological logging,  geophysical  logging,  and  test
pumping Exercise to determine the aquifer characteristics
Project Name: KRCS-Nalekat Duba pump
Role: Hydro geologist
Project DetailTeam Size: 4 Project Duration: 3 Day
Supervision of borehole test pumping exercise at Nalekat Duba pump-Pokot
East Red cross of Kenya.
Project Name: Merti project
Role: Hydro geologist
Team Size: 15 Project Duration: 3 Year 
Project Detail I had the privilege to take part in part of the project. It was a three year
Project sponsored by both the national government and NGOs.The project
was  cutting across  Garissa, Marsabit  and Wajir Counties. The aim was to
map the aquifers  within the region so as to advice on the best site for
boreholes development to meet the high demand for water due to scanty
rainfall throughout the year.
